resources.string: This sandwich is stunningly delicious and tastes as good as it is healthy. Any greens of choice will work. The lemon adds an almost sweet taste. Be generous with it!

Everyone loves this, so double or even triple the recipe! It vanishes in a flash, and also works well as a salsa. It really is our all-time favorite summer salad. The red onion adds a dash of color and the zest (the peel) intensifies the lime flavor.
Sweet Potato and Lentil Soup with Shiitake Mushrooms

This is FABULOUS alone, topped with fruit of any kind or as a frosting on cake. It is fast to make at the last minute. Use more or less lime according to taste.
